title.rendered: Oxbow Simple Rewards Baked Small Pet Treats – Apple & Banana

content.rendered: Ingredients: Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
Sweet and wholesome and blended to perfection, Oxbow Simple Rewards Baked Treats with Apple & Banana combine the irresistible flavors of real apple and banana with wholesome, high fiber Timothy hay to create a delicious treat rabbits, guinea pigs, chinchillas and other small pets love. Feed Oxbow treats to add variety and enrichment to your pet’s diet.

Key Benefits:

Real apple and banana
High fiber Timothy Hay

Item Number: 5177161

Brand: Oxbow

Food Type: Treat

Nutritional Option: Natural

Flavor: Apple & Banana

Weight: 3 oz
